expo.name: GoBuddy
expo.description: Find activity buddies on campus. Connect with students for sports, study sessions, and social activities.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to upload profile pictures and activity photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to select profile pictures and activity photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show nearby activities and buddies.
